name: 88 Read CSV Files and Write Parquet File

source: ## Write data to storage account in parquet file format

# Primary storage info
account_name = 'synapsedemos' # fill in your primary account name
container_name = 'curateddata' # fill in your container name
relative_path = 'WWI.parquet' # fill in your relative folder path

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s/' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path)
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path)
parquet_path = adls_path + 'PostalCodes'
df.write.parquet(parquet_path, mode = 'overwrite')

data_path = spark.read.load('abfss://rawdata@synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/WWI/wwi-dimcity.csv'
, format='csv'
, header=True
, sep='|'
)
#display(data_path.limit(10))
df = data_path.withColumnRenamed("City Key","CityKey")\
            .withColumnRenamed("WWI City ID", "WWICityID")\
            .withColumnRenamed("State Province", "StateProvince")\
            .withColumnRenamed("Sales Territory","SalesTerritory")\
            .withColumnRenamed("Latest Recorded Population","LatestRecordedPopulation")\
            .withColumnRenamed("Valid From","ValidFrom")\
            .withColumnRenamed("Valid To", "ValidTo")\
            .withColumnRenamed("Lineage Key","LineageKey")

display(df.limit(10))
parquet_path = adls_path + 'DimCity'
df.write.parquet(parquet_path, mode = 'overwrite')
